tool_description: An API that displays a list of the current welding and fabrication news.
name: Welding-Fab-News
title: Welding-Fab-News

api_list.name: Get Single Publication News
api_list.description: Get Welding and Fabrication from a Single Publication.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://welding-fab-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/AWS"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "welding-fab-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://welding-fab-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{publicationid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "welding-fab-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Welding-Fabrication News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all news related to the latest welding and fabrication information.
